skills.name: Shin - Seven Sakura
skills.description: [SP: 21][CD: 14s] Attacks enemies near the target with a 7-hit telekinetic slash sequence. Each slash deals 77% ATK of Physical DMG and immobilize them for 3.7s.

skills.name: Night Sakura
skills.description: During global Time Fracture, attacks hitting the target also cause bleeding, dealing 40% ATK of Physical DMG every 0.5s for 8.0s and inflicting 2 Bleed Trauma. CD: 1.5s. During Global Time Fracture, Physical DMG increases by 15%.
